TopicTitle: [International Aerospace Corporation] Almost Totally Reusable Satellite Launcher!

Articles.Content:
This is the almost totally reusable satellite launcher, it can easily reach low Kerbin orbit! This satellite was made with the word reusable in mind! After disconnecting off the 4 "boosters", they pop out parachutes! Then, for the orbital burn stage, try to release it a bit before making a stable orbit! If you won't it won't be much of a reusable design. I say this because that stage doesn't run out of fuel until you completed your orbit burn. Then, after disconnecting your satellite from the last stage, you can switch back to it and deorbit it.

That's the first craft from us at the International Aerospace Corporation, expect more from us soon!

Download
